QuestData.Title: Sharptalon's Claw
QuestData.Description: The mighty hippogryph Sharptalon has been slain, with the claw of the felled beast serving as a testament to your victory.$b$bSenani Thunderheart at the Silverwind Refuge will no doubt be interested in seeing this trophy as proof of your deeds.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Sharptalon's Claw to Senani Thunderheart at Silverwind Refuge.
QuestData.CompletionText: What have you there, $c? Could it be....?
QuestData.RewardText: You have slain the beast?$b$bI owe you a great debt, friend. That beast terrorized many over the years, but its death holds special meaning to me.$b$bYou see, recently my brother fell victim to these very claws... I shall sleep well now, knowing that he has been avenged.
